DESCRIPTION: If Mood gets to #b5 or more, gain a random #yInspiration, which is a powerful positive one-time effect, and then lose #b5 Mood.
If Mood gets to #b-5 or below, gain a random #yMental #yBreak, which gives #b2 #yStatuses based on its type, then gain #b5 Mood.

At the end of your turn, cards with #yFire #yCounters make you lose HP equal to their #yFire #yCounter. They then increase the #yFire #yCounter. Cards with #yFire #yCounters play an additional copy of themselves for every #yFire #yCounter above #b1, and #yExhaust.
After a number of turns, add #b2 #yDespairs to your hand and lose #b5 #yStrength.
Gain #b2 random #yStatus cards based on the type of break.
